description: This file defines a React functional component named ChartTypeSelect that provides a user interface for selecting a chart type ('bar', 'line', or 'pie'). It displays a set of buttons labeled accordingly, highlights the selected type, and calls a callback when a button is clicked.

methods.name: ChartTypeSelect({ value = 'bar', onChange = () => {} })
methods.description: A React functional component for selecting a chart type from predefined options.
